summary: Syntax and indenting for the BridgePoint OAL
name: OAL-Syntax
description:
Provides filetype, syntax, and indenting for OAL (Object Action Language) files. OAL is used with the BridgePoint UML modeling tool available from Mentor Graphics.

Files named *.oal will be automatically recognized.

NOTE: At the present, the BridgePoint editor can't be fully replaced by Vim, so be sure to load changes back into the BridgePoint editor before updating any names in the model!
install_details:
unzip to directory below vimfiles

CAUTION: If you already have a filetype.vim then don't allow the archive version to overwrite it!

versions.release_notes: Fixed error output of function redefinition on opening second OAL file in same window.
Previous version had a bug in the indent script.
